channel.title: [PI] Error loading [PI]
channel.description: I found this new PI source and I thought I would make it my first project to enhance and code on it as I am new to this and want to learn. However, when I go to load the client it gives me an error message. It says "Error Loading"; I gave the source and client to my friend and he was able to get on the server successfully, but I wasn't. Anyone help?

item.title: [PI] Error loading [PI]
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

That’s wierd that your friend could start up the client fine but you couldn’t, maybe the Cache didn’t download properly for you.

Only follow the below instructions if you Client downloads a Cache, if not don’t bother reading and i’m sorry I couldn’t resolve your problem.

So I advise downloading Dropbox, add the Cache to winrar and change it to ZIP then add to Dropbox, you will then get a link, go into Cachedownloader.java and search for this;

private String cacheLink = “Your Dropbox link here”; //

Change the link.

If all else fails, try placing your Cache into C: or just put it into the Client folder.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Error loading [PI]
item.dc:creator: @xhellgiverx xhellgiverx
item.description:
